thread.title: NIKOLOFF, PETER

author: NIKOLOFF, PETER
title: NIKOLOFF, PETER
text:
Great buy for the money.
I love the fully automatic experience.
Only a few things would like to point out that I don't like
1. Sometimes not enough coffee beans go inside the grinder-so the espresso is just .... water.
2. It's a messy water leak under the machine
Good thing is - there is a tray under.
Other then that -it's one nice espresso machine
